meanings.definition: The simultaneous infection of a host organism by multiple pathogens.
meanings.sent1: The coinfection of the patient by both viruses and bacteria made treatment more challenging.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the coinfection of the patient with two types of parasites.
meanings.sent3: The coinfection of the computer system by viruses and malware caused chaos in the office.
meanings.sent4: The coinfection of fear and excitement made her heart race as she waited for the results.
meanings.sent5: The coinfection of joy and relief flooded her heart when she heard the good news.

meanings.definition: The state of being infected by two or more different microorganisms at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The coinfection of the patient with multiple strains of bacteria required a specialized treatment plan.
meanings.sent2: The coinfection of the farm animals with different viruses led to a quarantine.
meanings.sent3: The coinfection of the garden plants by pests and fungi puzzled the gardener.
meanings.sent4: The coinfection of curiosity and doubt clouded her decision-making process.
meanings.sent5: The coinfection of determination and perseverance fueled her through the tough times.
